modules.AutoArmor: Wear best armor located in your inventory automatically
modules.AutoClick: Just press your left click to jitter click
modules.AutoPot: Throw instant health when your life is under predefined limit
modules.AutoSoup: Eat a soup when your life is under predefined limit
modules.BedAura: Automatically break enemy bed in bedwars
modules.BowAimbot: Automatically aim nearest enemy when you're charging your bow
modules.KillAura: Attack each player simultaneous or one by one depending of your configuration around you
modules.Triggerbot: Automatically attack players which are in your viewfinder
modules.Velocity: You can't be pushed by anyone

modules.IRC: Connect your Minecraft chat to an IRC chat with all client user
modules.Tower: Place blocks under your character when you jump

modules.AutoSneak: You are sneaking all the time
modules.Jesus: You can walk on top of water
modules.SafeWalk: Be blocked on block to prevent fall from it
modules.Step: Automatically step block without press jump key
modules.Strafe: Better control when you are in the airs

modules.Blink: Simulate lags. Other people see you lagging
modules.InvCleaner: Clean your inventory by drop useless items
modules.Freecam: Free cam, go out your body then walk around
modules.Glide: You can float in the air
modules.NoRotate: The server can't force your rotation
modules.Phase: You can pass through solid blocks

modules.EffectHUD: Show your current effects on screen
modules.NameTags: Render player nametags, far and bigger
modules.Trajectories: Show trajectories of items can be thrown
